title: 客户端崩溃,急求帮助
author: misaki丶mei
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Ouch. That hurt :(

Time: 15-11-28 下午9:47
Description: Ticking screen

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Server tried to update attributes of a non-living entity (actually: EntityChairMount['entity.CustomNpcChairMount.name'/135, l='MpServer', x=-54.50, y=64.00, z=167.50])

replies.author: 李永杏啊
replies.txt_content:
misaki丶mei 发表于 2015-11-28 22:19
然而已经解决了
让我猜猜，是在这个坐标的NPC有问题？
 x=-54.50, y=64.00, z=167.50
